references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models, introducing the core concept of denoising diffusion probabilistic models that underpins the work of diffusion transformers.

This paper introduces diffusion transformers (DiT), which are the specific architecture that SmoothCache is designed to optimize, making it a central reference for understanding the context of this work.

references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is highly influential for its introduction of denoising diffusion models, which are a core concept leveraged in the development of diffusion transformers and related acceleration techniques.
This paper is important as it demonstrates one of the successful applications of DiTs to audio generation, a modality that SmoothCache is shown to accelerate.
This paper introduces Stable Audio Open, a significant benchmark model used to evaluate SmoothCache’s performance on audio generation tasks, and to show the model-agnostic nature of SmoothCache.
